resources.string: Baraka a monster who comes from hell to devour people, he is best known as the reincarnation of Freddy Krueger
Jax man who went to Hitler s war and lost an arm, but his friend Ritler reconstituted his arm with an iron arm
JohnnyCage a playboy who has fulfilled his dream of being a martial arts lulator, has won many championships and his goal is to be the best
Kitana a warrior woman and strong with her strong and sharp fan she uses in battle to defeat enemies
KungLao a strong young man plus his strength comes from his incredible hat that can cut a person in half with much falicidad.
LiuKang a young warrior who lost his brother, he has a lot of strength, but unfortunately he does not know how to use and is always feeling insecure
Milena a very strong young warrior with her incredible abilities to have steel nails she came to help her friends to overcome evil
Raiden master of martial arts has faced many fighters and won, his fame goes around for having killed Bruce Lee
Scorpion a ninja assassin who has an incredible power to drop a serpende capturing the victim its main goal is to eliminate all martial arts fighters
Sub zero ninja assassin with his power to freeze a person in only 1 second, he intends to dominate the world when he reaches his maximum power
Reptile a very strong ninja and has a power that no other ninja has that is to be invisible in front of the enemy in just a few seconds it disappears completely
ShangTsung this character has a scary power he can turn into any person and unlike the mystical the XMEM he besides transform also has the power of the person
